info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:17PM MDT until June 01 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DANIELS AND NORTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 1116 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Redstone, or 20 miles northwest of Plentywood, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Redstone, Archer, Port Of Whitetail, Outlook, Navajo and Daleview. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
